thread.title: BRIEF-Yamana Gold Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.20 From Continuing Operations

title: BRIEF-Yamana Gold Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.20 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Yamana Gold Inc:
* YAMANA GOLD ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* ‍TOTAL PRODUCTION FOR Q4 WAS 259,606 OUNCES OF GOLD FROM YAMANA‘S SIX PRODUCING MINES​
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.20 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SAYS Q4 TOTAL COST OF SALES APPLICABLE TO GOLD OF $966 PER OUNCE
* QTRLY ‍REV $478.8 MILLION VERSUS $484.4 MILLION​ * QTRLY AVERAGE REALIZED GOLD PRICE PER OUNCE $1,286 VERSUS $1,210
‍​ * QTRLY AVERAGE REALIZED COPPER PRICE PER POUND $3.02 VERSUS. $2.48 ‍​
* QTRLY AVERAGE REALIZED SILVER PRICE PER OUNCE $16.49 VERSUS $17.17 ‍​
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $471.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
